paper.title: Applying Web service and Windows clustering for high volume risk analysis
paper.abstract: We present the development of a distributed system to calculate the Value at Risk (VaR) measure when a large number of users are presented A scalable architecture based on Windows clustering and web services is proposed. In addition, we develop a load balancing algorithm to distribute the workload among the compute nodes in the Windows cluster. The experimental results show that our system can substantially speed up the VaR calculation. In addition, it offers a good scalability. This work provides an example of how to deploy a standard web service and Windows clustering technology to offer a cost-effective and scalable solution for demanding financial applications in practice.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是开发一个分布式系统来计算Value at Risk (VaR)，这是金融风险管理中的一个重要指标。论文明确提到其目标是提供一个可扩展的解决方案，用于高要求的金融应用，特别是风险分析。
